title: Is it bad that I like a Justin Bieber song? - Quora

response.answer_text: there is nothing bad in liking justin bieber song . he is one of the one of the worlds best music selling artists. He also became the second person to reach 100million subs on twitter in late August 2017. he is one among the top 10 most powerful celebs in the world. ABOUT SONGS:- his song s are just as fabulous as he looks. some of the best songs we know are :- SORRY BABY WHERE ARE YOU NOW BOYFRIEND WHAT DO YOU MEAN LOVE YOURSELF COMPANY BEAUTY AND A BEAT COLD WATER NEVER SAY NEVER I’LL SHOW YOU FINALLY, ””DESPACITO””,may be completely not from justin but it definitely became most popular song because of this man! are some fantastic songs of justin biebers. he has dark childhood , great tone, bright style , girl friends , break ups ,fans , beliebers (more than fans ),millions of followers , and ARMY of haters (frankly not haters at oll) these are the people who will sing his BABY song when they are alone think of how he could make such a master piece at the age of SIXTEEN(16)! yes, he released and there are people who dont like to encourage such talent named themselves as haters of jb and started disliking song baby this is the fact that most people who hate jb are just not want to digest a boy becoming a billionaire. the is nothing wrong with his songs they are just AWESOME! but talent never hides when it is exposed once !

Not it is not bad…But it is mainstream…. Let me tell you my story..How I gradually shifted my music taste.. I am an Indian Citizen..So as a Child I only listen to my own Hindi Songs..Soon Enough the Western music dawned my place and we started English music although we didn't understand a word..But it became trendy among my friends circle..Not so long I started humming certain tones of the songs..and one fine day I become a regular listener of English Music..Started with Pop,I Spent 2 yrs listening to Akon,Enrique,Taylor Swift,Rihana unaware of Some other musical bands….Giving halt to that I shifted to listening some Rock Bands like Maroon 5,One Direction,Coldplay ..These all were famous at that time and We are always fascinated towards popular contents..But As I go further into the variety of music,I came across Linkin Park(one of my favourites)..and I reached to the hardcore part of the music…Then I searched a lot of Rock bands..Vintage bands like Queen,Rollimg Stones,Metallica etc…Now I have listened to all the famous Rock bands and Currently I changed my Genre to Blues.. So listening to some Musician is not bad..But Listening only to that Musician is bad and You can't say which one is good unless you try variety…
